title: INTERPOL Arrests 8 in Major Phishing and Romance Fraud Crackdown in West Africa
description: INTERPOL has announced the arrest of eight individuals in CÃ´te d'Ivoire and Nigeria as part of a crackdown on phishing scams and romance cyber fraud. Dubbed Operation Contender 2.0, the initiative is designed to tackle cyber-enabled crimes in West Africa, the agency said. One such threat involved a large-scale phishing scam targeting Swiss citizens that resulted in financial losses to the tune
